stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Sage's Pi Rune Still Unlocks Cosmos' Secrets
stories.fantasy_story: A century-old magical formula, once penned by the wise Sage Ramanujan, is still revealing profound truths about the universe. The Royal Alchemists' Guild found that its elegant patterns perfectly describe powerful currents and hidden flows within our very world. It seems the old magic continues to echo through time.

stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Goblet Reveals Master Crafters' Hidden Markings
stories.fantasy_story: Within the Royal Archives, a simple turn of an ancient Roman glass goblet revealed a long-lost secret. Faint symbols, once thought mere decoration, were uncovered as the unique marks of master crafters' guilds. This discovery changes centuries of belief about these enchanted artifacts.
